attributes.action: Consider the validity of the EU referendum
attributes.background: The EU referendum was campaigned for & against on the basis of misleading statements.If significant people believe they were misled when casting their vote or that they did not have sufficient information to take an informed decision, should the decision stand?

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
